BHI: if (c_flag == 1 && z_flag == 0) { //branch if C flag set and Z flag clear
BLS: if (c_flag == 0 && z_flag == 1) { //branch if C flag clear and Z flag set
BGE: if ((n_flag == 1 && v_flag == 1) || (n_flag == 0 && v_flag == 0)) { //branch if ((N flag set and V flag set) or (N flag clear and V flag clear))
BLT: if ((n_flag == 1 && v_flag == 0) || (n_flag == 0 && v_flag == 1)) { //branch if ((N flag set and V flag clear) or if (N flag clear and V flag set))
BGT: if (z_flag == 0 && ((n_flag == 1 || v_flag == 1) || (n_flag == 0 && v_flag == 0))) { //branch if (Z flag clear and ((N flag set or V flag set) or (N flag clear or V flag clear)))
BLE: if (z_flag == 1 || ((n_flag == 1 && v_flag == 0) || (n_flag == 0 && v_flag == 1))) { //branch if (Z flag set or ((N flag set and V flag clear) or (N flag clear and V flag set)))
